column14: Great Product, I only wish they would have packed it better.  Three bottles in a plastic bag and none of the bottles lids were tight!  So yes I had a big miss on my hands literally not to mention the lose of shampoo!

column14: The product is fine, I use it regularly, but the caps on these bottles are not well fitted and at least one bottle had leaked when I opened the delivery.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
column14: I like using this product and knowing there is nothing to harm my hair or scalp. I'm on my second bottle. My wife says my thinning has stabilized and may actually be reversing. I'm going to stick with this product. It lathers well and rinses clean. I think it's just a good shampoo.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
column14: They changed this product awhile back but I will say it is far better and the older one was great also but this is the best shampoo for fine hair. it works like a charm I do not need mouse and it always is shiney.
